import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons" import "./post.css" import { Users} from "../../dummyData" function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) return (
u.id===post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id===post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{/* ? for some of the post dont have description */} {post?.desc} {/* post image */}
{post.like}
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
